<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 18PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="LEFT">

<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">

</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
	(1) Estimated solely for the purpose of calculating the registration fee pursuant to Rule 457 under the Securities Act.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
	(2) Pursuant to Rule 457(p) under the Securities Act, the securities registered pursuant to this registration statement include unsold securities previously registered by the registrant on the registrant's registration statement (File No. 333-194144) filed on October 24, 2014 and declared effective on November 21, 2014 (the &#8220;2014 Registration Statement&#8221;). The 2014 Registration Statement registered the offer and sale of Gold Deposit Receipts having an aggregate initial offering price of $500,000,000, all of which remain unsold as of the date of filing this registration statement&#160;&#160;(the &#8220;Unsold Securities&#8221;). The registrant has determined to include the Unsold Securities in this registration statement and to apply $50,350.00 of the filing fee of $64,400.00 relating to the Unsold Securities under the 2014 Registration Statement to the securities registered pursuant to this registration statement.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT">

</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; TEXT-INDENT: 18PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 12PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	The Registrant hereby amends this Registration Statement on such date or dates as may be necessary to delay its effective date until the Registrant shall file a further amendment which specifically states that this Registration Statement shall thereafter become effective in accordance with Section 8(a) of the Securities Act of 1933, as amended, or until this Registration Statement shall become effective on such date as the Commission, acting pursuant to such Section 8(a), may determine.
</FONT>

<A NAME="eolPage3"></A>
<DIV ID="HDR">
<DIV ID="GLHDR" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%" ALIGN="RIGHT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 8PT">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</DIV>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV>
<DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="CENTER">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 12PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
<IMG SRC="http://content.edgar-online.com/edgar_conv_img/2016/06/06/0001214659-16-012033_BMOLOGOSM.JPG" ALT="">
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="CENTER">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="CENTER">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 14PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	$500,000,000 of Gold Deposit Receipts
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="CENTER">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 14PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Vaulted Gold Bullion Trust
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="LEFT">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 18PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="LEFT">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; TEXT-INDENT: 18PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 18PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	The Vaulted Gold Bullion Trust (the &#8220;Trust&#8221;) will issue Depositary Receipts (the &#8220;Gold Deposit Receipts&#8221;) representing your undivided beneficial ownership in a fixed quantity of unencumbered, allocated, physical gold bullion (&#8220;Gold Bullion&#8221;). The Gold Bullion will be held for the benefit of holders of Gold Deposit Receipts in an account operated by Bank of Montreal at the Royal Canadian Mint (the &#8220;Mint&#8221;). The Bank of New York Mellon will be the trustee of the Trust. The Gold Deposit Receipts are separate from the Gold Bullion.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 18PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="LEFT">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 18PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Investing in the Gold Deposit Receipts involves a high degree of risk. You should purchase these securities only if you can afford a complete loss of your investment.&#160;&#160;See &#8220;Risk Factors&#8221; starting on page&#160;11.&#160;&#160;An investment in the Gold Deposit Receipts represents an investment in gold, which may not be appropriate for all investors.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 18PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="LEFT">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 18PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT SIZE="2" STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 18PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT SIZE="2" STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	The Trust is offering to the public on a continuous basis three classes of Gold Deposit Receipts: Class A Gold Deposit Receipts; Class F Gold Deposit Receipts; and Class F-1 Gold Deposit Receipts. The only difference among these classes of Gold Deposit Receipts relates to the sales fee applicable to each class.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 18PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT SIZE="2" STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	The public offering price for each Gold Deposit Receipt will be based on the&#160;spot price for one troy ounce of Gold Bullion,&#160;determined by BMO Capital Markets Corp.
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	using EBS, an offering of EBS BrokerTec (&#8220;EBS&#8221;), as the source for the spot price of gold, without adjustment or modification,
</FONT>
	plus a deposit fee of 2.00%, payable to Bank of Montreal, plus (1) in the case of a Class A Gold Deposit Receipt, a sales fee of 2.00% to any participating broker-dealer that sells Gold Deposit Receipts to an investor; (2) in the case of a Class F Gold Deposit Receipt, which will be sold only through fee-based programs, a sales fee of 0.25%; and (3) in the case of Class F-1 Gold Deposit Receipts, which will be sold to trust or fiduciary accounts, no additional fee.&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="2" STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	The Trust will use the proceeds of the issuance of Gold Deposit Receipts, net of these fees, to purchase Gold Bullion from Bank of Montreal in an amount that corresponds to the amount of Gold Deposit Receipts.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT">
	&#160;
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; TEXT-INDENT: 18PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT">
<FONT SIZE="2">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	The indicative initial price to public shown below is the price to public on a particular date.
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	An investor considering a purchase or redemption of Gold Deposit Receipts may obtain end of day indicative pricing from the Trust&#8217;s website. Real-time indicative quotations are available from the Bloomberg Terminal (&#8220;Bloomberg&#8221;) using &lt;BMOEGLDR Index Go&gt; and these quotations also will be available (on a delayed basis) at Bloomberg.com.&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	YOUR BROKER WILL CONFIRM THE EXECUTION PRICE TO YOU.&#160;
</FONT>
	See
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&#8220;
</FONT>
	Description of Gold Deposit Receipts
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&#8212;
</FONT>
	How to Obtain Pricing Information
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&#8221;
</FONT>
	.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</FONT>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK">
	&#160;
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 18PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL">
	The Trust is newly formed. The Trust is not an investment company registered under the Investment Company Act of 1940, as amended (the &#8220;1940 Act&#8221;).&#160;&#160;The Trust is not a commodity pool for purposes of the Commodity Exchange Act, and the initial depositor is not subject to regulation by the Commodity Futures Trading Commission as a commodity pool, or a commodity trading advisor.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 18PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	The Trust is an &#8220;emerging growth company&#8221; as
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	defined
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	in the Jumpstart Our Business Startups Act, or JOBS Act, and, as such, may elect to comply with certain reduced reporting requirements after this offering.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 18PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL">
	The Gold Deposit Receipts are neither interests in, nor obligations of, the initial depositor, Bank of Montreal, or The Bank of New&#160;York Mellon, as trustee.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 18PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="LEFT">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV ID="PGBRK" STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT">
<DIV ID="FTR">
<DIV ID="GLFTR" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 8PT">

<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; TEXT-INDENT: 18PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	The Gold Deposit Receipts will not be listed or traded on any securities exchange. Only Authorized Participants may offer the Gold Deposit Receipts to the public. Under no circumstance may any purchase of the Gold Deposit Receipts be made with borrowed or leveraged funds advanced by an Authorized Participant. No margin purchases of the Gold Deposit Receipts will be accepted.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT">
	&#160;
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 18PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Neither the Securities and Exchange Commission nor any state securities commission has approved or disapproved these securities or determined if this prospectus is truthful or complete.&#160;&#160;Any representation to the contrary is a criminal offense.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</DIV>

<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	* The initial price to public as of 12 PM EST on June 3, 2016, which reflects a spot price of $1,239.60, as provided on EBS, plus the deposit and, if applicable, a sales fee.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	** Reflects a deposit fee of 2.00%.&#160;&#160;In addition, reflects a sales fee for each Class A Gold Deposit Receipt of 2.00% and a sales fee for each Class F Gold Deposit Receipt of 0.25%.&#160;&#160;There is no sales fee for Class F-1 Gold Deposit Receipts. See
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&#8220;Plan of Distribution&#8221; beginning on page 52 for additional information regarding fees payable to Authorized Participants.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT SIZE="2">
	&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 18PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	BMO Capital Markets Corp. will use the spot price of gold reflected on EBS as the source for the spot price of gold. BMO Capital Markets Corp. will refer to this source without adjustment or modification. If, for any reason, EBS is not posting spot prices, BMO Capital Markets Corp. will use the spot price reflected by the&#160;
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	London Bullion Market Association (the &#8220;LBMA&#8221;)
</FONT>
	(PM) Gold Price, an offering of ICE Benchmark Administration
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	(the &#8220;IBA&#8221;)
</FONT>
	, as its source for the spot price of gold. BMO Capital Markets Corp. will refer to this source without adjustment or modification.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	On any given day, the price to public will vary.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK">
	&#160;&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 18PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="LEFT">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; TEXT-INDENT: 18PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	A minimum of one whole Gold Deposit Receipt must be purchased in any transaction. BMO Capital Markets Corp. will act as the underwriter of this continuous offering, purchasing, on a principal basis, Gold Deposit Receipts when issued by the Trust and reselling the Gold Deposit Receipts to Authorized Participants.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</DIV>

	46

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
	This prospectus contains information you should consider when making your investment decision.&#160;&#160;With respect to information about Gold Deposit Receipts, you should rely only on the information contained in this prospectus.&#160;&#160;We have not authorized any other person to provide you with different information.&#160;&#160;If anyone provides you with different or inconsistent information, you should not rely on it.&#160;&#160;We are not making an offer to sell Gold Deposit Receipts in
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
	any
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
	jurisdiction
</FONT>
	where the offer or sale is not permitted.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; TEXT-INDENT: 36PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
	The Gold Deposit Receipts are not registered for public sale outside of the United States.&#160;&#160;Holders that are not U.S. holders (as defined under &#8220;U.S. Federal Income Tax Consequences&#8221;) should consult their tax advisors regarding U.S. withholding and other taxes that may apply to ownership of the Gold Deposit Receipts or of the Gold Bullion through an investment in the Gold Deposit Receipts.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">

<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; WIDTH: 100%">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
	i
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; WIDTH: 100%">
<HR STYLE="COLOR: BLACK" NOSHADE SIZE="2">
</DIV>

<A NAME="eolPage6"></A>
<DIV ID="HDR">
<DIV ID="GLHDR" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 8PT">
<A HREF="#D63160S1_HTM_TOC">
	Table of Contents
</A>
</FONT>
</DIV>
</DIV>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="CENTER">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN BOLD, TIMES NEW ROMAN, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	SALES RESTRICTIONS AND NOTICES
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	THE GOLD DEPOSIT RECEIPTS MAY BE SOLD TO INSTITUTIONAL INVESTORS IN ANY STATE AND PUERTO RICO.&#160;&#160;RETAIL INVESTORS SHOULD FAMILIARIZE THEMSELVES WITH THE FOLLOWING RESTRICTIONS AND NOTICES:
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="LEFT">
	&#160;
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN BOLD, TIMES NEW ROMAN, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	THE GOLD DEPOSIT RECEIPTS ARE NOT APPROVED FOR SALE AND SHOULD NOT BE SOLD TO RESIDENTS OF THE STATES OF ALABAMA, ARIZONA OR TENNESSEE, OTHER THAN TO INSTITUTIONAL INVESTORS. ALL SALES IN THE STATE OF TEXAS WILL ONLY BE MADE BY A TEXAS-REGISTERED BROKER-DEALER.&#160;&#160;ALL SALES IN THE STATE OF NORTH CAROLINA WILL ONLY BE MADE BY A NORTH CAROLINA REGISTERED BROKER-DEALER.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN BOLD, TIMES NEW ROMAN, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN BOLD; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN BOLD, TIMES NEW ROMAN, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	CALIFORNIA INVESTORS MUST BE ABLE TO EVIDENCE EITHER:&#160; (A) $65,000 ANNUAL GROSS INCOME AND $250,000 LIQUID NET WORTH&#160;
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, SERIF">
	(AS DEFINED BELOW)
</FONT>
	; OR (B) $500,000 LIQUID NET WORTH.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="LEFT">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="LEFT">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN BOLD; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
	&#160;
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
</FONT>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	OREGON AND OKLAHOMA INVESTORS MUST BE ABLE TO EVIDENCE A LIQUID NET WORTH&#160;OF $250,000 OR MORE TO INVEST IN THIS OFFERING.&#160; TEXAS INVESTORS MUST BE ABLE TO EVIDENCE EITHER (A) $100,000 ANNUAL NET INCOME AND $100,000 NET WORTH OR (B) $250,000 LIQUID NET WORTH.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN BOLD; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</DIV>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN BOLD, TIMES NEW ROMAN, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	IT SHALL BE UNSUITABLE FOR A RETAIL INVESTOR&#8217;S AGGREGATE INVESTMENT IN GOLD DEPOSIT RECEIPTS TO EXCEED TEN PERCENT (10%) OF HIS, HER, OR ITS LIQUID NET WORTH.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN BOLD, TIMES NEW ROMAN, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	&#8220;LIQUID NET WORTH
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&#8221;
</FONT>
	SHALL BE DEFINED AS THAT PORTION OF NET WORTH (TOTAL ASSETS EXCLUSIVE OF HOME, HOME FURNISHINGS, AND AUTOMOBILES MINUS TOTAL LIABILITIES) THAT IS COMPRISED OF CASH, CASH EQUIVALENTS, AND READILY MARKETABLE SECURITIES. PLEASE CONSULT YOUR FINANCIAL AND TAX ADVISER.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN BOLD, TIMES NEW ROMAN, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	INVESTORS SHOULD REVIEW CAREFULLY THE PROSPECTUS AND UNDERSTAND, AMONG OTHER THINGS, THAT:&#160; THE GOLD DEPOSIT RECEIPTS ARE NOT LISTED OR TRADED ON A SECURITIES EXCHANGE (SEE &#8220;DESCRIPTION OF GOLD DEPOSIT RECEIPTS
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&#8212;
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	PURCHASES AND SALES OF GOLD DEPOSIT RECEIPTS&#8221;), THE GOLD DEPOSIT RECEIPTS DO NOT PROVIDE FOR CURRENT PAYMENTS OF INTEREST OR PRINCIPAL, HOLDERS OF THE GOLD DEPOSIT RECEIPTS WILL HAVE NO
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	VOTING
</FONT>
	RIGHTS, EXCEPT IN LIMITED CIRCUMSTANCES (SEE &#8220;DESCRIPTION OF THE GOLD DEPOSIT RECEIPTS
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&#8212;
</FONT>
	VOTING RIGHTS&#8221;), AND ONLY HOLDERS LOCATED IN A DELIVERY STATE WILL BE ABLE TO RECEIVE DELIVERY OF BULLION (SEE &#8220;DESCRIPTION OF THE GOLD DEPOSIT RECEIPTS
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&#8212;
</FONT>
	REDEMPTIONS OF GOLD DEPOSIT RECEIPTS FOR GOLD BULLION; SALES FOR CASH
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&#8212;
</FONT>
	PHYSICAL DELIVERY&#8221;).
</FONT>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN BOLD, TIMES NEW ROMAN, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	THE PRICE OF GOLD DEPOSIT RECEIPTS ON ANY DAY REPRESENTS THE PRICE AT WHICH A HOLDER CAN SELL GOLD BULLION TO BANK OF MONTREAL AND IS BASED ON&#160;U.S. DOLLAR SPOT PRICES.
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	BMO CAPITAL MARKETS CORP. WILL USE THE SPOT PRICE OF GOLD REFLECTED ON EBS AS THE SOURCE FOR THE SPOT PRICE OF GOLD. BMO CAPITAL MARKETS CORP. WILL REFER TO THIS SOURCE WITHOUT ADJUSTMENT OR MODIFICATION. IF, FOR ANY REASON, EBS IS NOT POSTING SPOT PRICES, BMO CAPITAL MARKETS CORP. WILL USE THE SPOT PRICE REFLECTED BY THE LBMA (PM) GOLD PRICE AS ITS SOURCE FOR THE SPOT PRICE OF GOLD. BMO CAPITAL MARKETS CORP. WILL REFER TO THIS SOURCE WITHOUT ADJUSTMENT OR MODIFICATION.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN BOLD, TIMES NEW ROMAN, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	BANK OF MONTREAL RESERVES THE RIGHT TO CHARGE A CUSTODY FEE WITH RESPECT TO HOLDING THE TRUST&#8217;S GOLD BULLION AT BANK OF MONTREAL&#8217;S CUSTODIAL ACCOUNT. IF BANK OF MONTREAL WERE TO CHARGE SUCH A FEE, IT WOULD AFFECT THE TRUST&#8217;S EXPENSES AND THE PRICE OF THE GOLD DEPOSIT RECEIPTS. HOWEVER, ANY CUSTODY FEE WILL NOT EXCEED 0.50% PER ANNUM OF THE DAILY AVERAGE CLOSING PRICE OF GOLD BULLION REPRESENTED BY THE GOLD DEPOSIT RECEIPTS, AS CALCULATED BY BANK OF MONTREAL ACTING IN GOOD FAITH.
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	FOR ADDITIONAL INFORMATION ON THE CUSTODY FEE, PLEASE SEE &#8220;DESCRIPTION OF THE GOLD DEPOSIT RECEIPTS
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&#8212;
</FONT>
	CUSTODY OF THE GOLD BULLION&#8221;.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</DIV>
</DIV>

<A NAME="FIS_MORE_INFORMATION"></A>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	THE TERM &#8220;INSTITUTIONAL INVESTOR&#8221; IS UNDERSTOOD TO MEAN: A BANK, SAVINGS AND LOAN ASSOCIATION, INSURANCE COMPANY OR REGISTERED INVESTMENT COMPANY;
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	AN INVESTMENT ADVISER REGISTERED EITHER WITH THE SEC UNDER SECTION 203 OF THE INVESTMENT ADVISERS ACT OR WITH A STATE SECURITIES COMMISSION (OR ANY AGENCY OR OFFICE PERFORMING LIKE FUNCTIONS);
</FONT>
	OR ANY OTHER PERSON (WHETHER A NATURAL PERSON, CORPORATION, PARTNERSHIP, TRUST OR OTHERWISE) WITH TOTAL ASSETS OF AT LEAST $50 MILLION.
</FONT>
</DIV>

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
	The Vaulted Gold Bullion Trust (the &#8220;Trust&#8221;) was initially formed on December 10, 2013.&#160; The Trust is governed by the Amended and Restated&#160;Depositary Trust Agreement, dated&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;, 2016&#160;by and among The Bank of New York Mellon, as trustee, BNY Trust of Delaware, as Delaware trustee, Bank of Montreal, as initial depositor, and BMO Capital Markets Corp., as&#160;underwriter (the &#8220;Depositary Trust Agreement&#8221;).&#160;&#160;The Trust has no assets or liabilities.&#160;&#160;The Trust is not a registered investment company under the 1940 Act.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 36PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>

<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 36PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
	At all times, the Trust will hold a fixed quantity of unencumbered, allocated, physical gold bullion (&#8220;Gold Bullion&#8221;) that corresponds to the then outstanding Gold Deposit Receipts.&#160;&#160;The Gold Bullion will be held for the benefit of holders of Gold Deposit Receipts in an account operated by Bank of Montreal at the Royal Canadian Mint (the &#8220;Mint&#8221;).&#160;&#160;One troy ounce of Gold Bullion will correspond to each Gold Deposit Receipt as specified under &#8220;Summary of Gold Deposit Receipts&#160;&#8212;&#160;The Gold Deposit Receipts.&#8221;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 36PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
	The Trust will issue Gold Deposit Receipts that represent your undivided beneficial ownership interest in Gold Bullion held by the Trust on your behalf.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 12PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Trust Objective
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 36PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
	The objective of the Trust is to provide a secure and convenient way for investors to make an investment in unencumbered, allocated, physical Gold Bullion on a spot basis.&#160;&#160;As a result, at any given time, the value of the Gold Deposit Receipts is intended to reflect the spot price of gold held by the Trust for the holders of Gold Deposit Receipts.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 36PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
	The Trust is not actively managed and has no officers or employees.&#160;&#160;The Trust does not engage in any activities designed to obtain a profit from, or to prevent losses caused by, changes in the spot price of gold.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 36PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
	The Trust will issue Gold Deposit Receipts upon the contribution by Bank of Montreal to the Trust of a fixed quantity of Gold Bullion purchased with the proceeds, less the deposit fee and any sales fee, from the sale of Gold Deposit Receipts. Bank of Montreal will hold the Gold Bullion in an account that is operated by Bank of Montreal at the Mint in custody for the holders of Gold Deposit Receipts. BMO Capital Markets Corp. will&#160;act as&#160;the underwriter for the sale of Gold Deposit Receipts,
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
	pursuant to a distribution agreement among the Trust, Bank of Montreal and BMO Capital Markets Corp
</FONT>
	.&#160;&#160;BMO Capital Markets Corp. will enter into dealer agreements with certain third parties that are registered broker-dealers, or banks or trust companies regulated by the Office of the Comptroller of the Currency and/or one or more state banking regulators that are either direct or indirect DTC Participants.&#160;
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
	We refer to these third parties, as&#160;well as any other dealer that becomes a party to the distribution agreement, as Authorized Participants.
</FONT>
	&#160; Only Authorized Participants will be involved in the distribution of Gold Deposit Receipts.&#160; Holders of Gold Deposit Receipts may elect to redeem their Gold Deposit Receipts for physical gold or exchange their Gold Deposit Receipts for cash either through an Authorized Participant or through a registered broker-dealer or similar entity that is not an Authorized Participant.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</DIV>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV ID="PGBRK" STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT">
<DIV ID="FTR">
<DIV ID="GLFTR" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
	&#160;
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV ID="PN" STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: ALWAYS; WIDTH: 100%">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; WIDTH: 100%">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
	1
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; WIDTH: 100%">
<HR STYLE="COLOR: BLACK" NOSHADE SIZE="2">
</DIV>
</DIV>
<A NAME="eolPage8"></A>
<DIV ID="HDR">
<DIV ID="GLHDR" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 8PT">
<A HREF="#D63160S1_HTM_TOC">
	Table of Contents
</A>
</FONT>
</DIV>
</DIV>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="BORDER-BOTTOM: BLACK 1PX SOLID; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; BORDER-LEFT: BLACK 1PX SOLID; PADDING-BOTTOM: 5PX; PADDING-LEFT: 3%; PADDING-RIGHT: 3%; BORDER-TOP: BLACK 1PX SOLID; BORDER-RIGHT: BLACK 1PX SOLID; PADDING-TOP: 5PX">
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH: 100%">
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 36PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
	The Trust may offer Gold Deposit Receipts from time to time as it receives Gold Bullion purchased on a daily basis for deposit in the Bank of Montreal account at the Mint, all as described more fully herein.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 36PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
	The Gold Deposit Receipts will not be listed or quoted on any national securities exchange.&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<BR>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 36PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="LEFT">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 12PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Class A, Class F and Class F-1 Gold Deposit Receipts
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; TEXT-INDENT: 36PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
	The Trust is offering to the public three classes of Gold Deposit Receipts: Class A Gold Deposit Receipts; Class F Gold Deposit Receipts; and Class F-1 Gold Deposit Receipts. The only difference among these classes of Gold Deposit Receipts relates to the sales fee applicable to each class.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; TEXT-INDENT: 36PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
	BMO Capital Markets Corp. will use the spot price of gold reflected on EBS as the source for the spot price of gold. BMO Capital Markets Corp. will refer to this source without adjustment or modification. If, for any reason, EBS is not posting spot prices, BMO Capital Markets Corp. will use the spot price reflected by the LBMA (PM) Gold Price as its source for the spot price of gold. BMO Capital Markets Corp. will refer to this source without adjustment or modification. The public offering price for each Gold Deposit Receipt will be based on the spot price for one troy ounce of Gold Bullion,&#160;determined by BMO Capital Markets Corp.
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
	using EBS as the source for the spot price of gold, without adjustment or modification,
</FONT>
	plus a deposit fee of 2.00%, payable to Bank of Montreal, plus: (1) in the case of a Class A Gold Deposit Receipt, a
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
	sales fee
</FONT>
	of 2.00% to any participating broker-dealer that sells Gold Deposit Receipts to an investor; (2) in the case of a Class F Gold Deposit Receipt, which will be sold only through fee-based programs, a sales fee of 0.25%; and (3) in the case of Class F-1 Gold Deposit Receipts, which will be sold to trust or fiduciary accounts, no additional fee.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; TEXT-INDENT: 36PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
	The table below summarizes the fees payable with respect to the Class A and Class
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
	F and Class
</FONT>
	F-1 Gold Deposit Receipts.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT">
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="90%" STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 12PT; FONT-SIZE: 12PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 12PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD; TEXT-DECORATION: UNDERLINE">
	Deposit Fee
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" WIDTH="22%" STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT">

</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" WIDTH="22%" STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT">

</FONT>
</DIV>

<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 12PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Summary of Risks
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 36PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
	The Gold Deposit Receipts are subject to certain risks, discussed in more detail in the section entitled &#8220;Risk Factors&#8221; below. Examples of these risks include:
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV>
<TABLE ALIGN="CENTER" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" ID="HANGINGINDENT" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 12PT; FONT-SIZE: 12PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<TR VALIGN="TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 18PT">
<DIV>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 18PT">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: SYMBOL; FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
	&#183;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
	the Trust has no history of operations and Bank of Montreal has a limited history of operating investment vehicles similar to the Trust;
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<DIV>
<TABLE ALIGN="CENTER" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" ID="HANGINGINDENT" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 12PT; FONT-SIZE: 12PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<TR VALIGN="TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 18PT">
<DIV>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 18PT">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: SYMBOL; FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
	&#183;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
	the value of Gold Bullion is not guaranteed, which may cause an investment in the Gold Deposit Receipts to be volatile;
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<DIV>
<TABLE ALIGN="CENTER" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" ID="HANGINGINDENT" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 12PT; FONT-SIZE: 12PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<TR VALIGN="TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 18PT">
<DIV>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 18PT">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: SYMBOL; FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
	&#183;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
	future governmental decisions may have significant impact on the price of Gold Bullion, which will impact the price of the Gold Deposit Receipts;
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV>
<TABLE ALIGN="CENTER" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" ID="HANGINGINDENT" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 12PT; FONT-SIZE: 12PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<TR VALIGN="TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 18PT">
<DIV>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 18PT">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: SYMBOL; FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
	&#183;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
	the Trust is a passive investment vehicle, which means that the value of the Gold Deposit Receipts may be adversely affected by losses that, if the Trust had been actively managed, it might have been possible to avoid; and
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV>
<TABLE ALIGN="CENTER" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" ID="HANGINGINDENT" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 12PT; FONT-SIZE: 12PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<TR VALIGN="TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 18PT">
<DIV>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 18PT">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: SYMBOL; FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
	&#183;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
	because the Trust holds solely Gold Bullion, an investment in the Trust may be more volatile than an investment in a more broadly diversified portfolio.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</DIV>
</DIV>
</DIV>
</DIV>
</DIV>
</DIV>
</DIV>
</DIV>
</DIV>
</DIV>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<DIV ID="PGBRK" STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT">
<DIV ID="FTR">
<DIV ID="GLFTR" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
	&#160;
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV ID="PN" STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: ALWAYS; WIDTH: 100%">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; WIDTH: 100%">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
	2
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; WIDTH: 100%">

<A NAME="eolPage9"></A>
<DIV ID="HDR">
<DIV ID="GLHDR" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 8PT">
<A HREF="#D63160S1_HTM_TOC">
	Table of Contents
</A>
</FONT>
</DIV>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<DIV STYLE="BORDER-BOTTOM: BLACK 1PX SOLID; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; BORDER-LEFT: BLACK 1PX SOLID; PADDING-BOTTOM: 5PX; PADDING-LEFT: 3%; PADDING-RIGHT: 3%; BORDER-TOP: BLACK 1PX SOLID; BORDER-RIGHT: BLACK 1PX SOLID; PADDING-TOP: 5PX">
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH: 100%">
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 12PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Emerging Growth Company Status
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 36PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
	The Trust is an &#8220;emerging growth company,&#8221; as defined in t
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
	he Jumpstart Our Business Startups Act (the &#8220;JOBS Act&#8221;)
</FONT>
	. For as long as the Trust is an &#8220;emerging growth company,&#8221; the Trust may take advantage of certain exemptions from various reporting requirements that are applicable to other public companies that are not &#8220;emerging growth companies,&#8221; including, but not limited to, not being required to comply with the auditor attestation requirements of Section 404(b) of the Sarbanes
<FONT STYLE="FONT-STYLE: ITALIC; DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
	&#8211;
</FONT>
	Oxley Act of 2002 (the &#8220;Sarbanes-Oxley Act&#8221;), reduced disclosure obligations regarding executive compensation in the Trust&#8217;s periodic reports, and exemptions from the requirements of holding advisory &#8220;say-on-pay&#8221; votes on executive compensation and shareholder advisory votes on golden parachute compensation.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 36PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
	Under the JOBS Act, the Trust will remain an &#8220;emerging growth company&#8221; until the earliest of:
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 36PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="LEFT">
	&#160;&#160;
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<DIV>
<TABLE ALIGN="CENTER" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" ID="HANGINGINDENT" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 12PT; FONT-SIZE: 12PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<TR VALIGN="TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 18PT">
<DIV>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 18PT">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: SYMBOL; FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
	&#183;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD>
<DIV ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
	the last day of the fiscal year during which the Trust has total annual gross revenues of $1 billion or more;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV>
<TABLE ALIGN="CENTER" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" ID="HANGINGINDENT" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 12PT; FONT-SIZE: 12PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<TR VALIGN="TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 18PT">
<DIV>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 18PT">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: SYMBOL; FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
	&#183;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD>
<DIV ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
	the last day of the fiscal year following the fifth anniversary of the completion of this offering;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV>
<TABLE ALIGN="CENTER" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" ID="HANGINGINDENT" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 12PT; FONT-SIZE: 12PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<TR VALIGN="TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 18PT">
<DIV>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 18PT">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: SYMBOL; FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
	&#183;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD>
<DIV ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
	the date on which the Trust has, during the previous three-year period, issued more than $1 billion in non-convertible debt; and
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV>
<TABLE ALIGN="CENTER" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" ID="HANGINGINDENT" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 12PT; FONT-SIZE: 12PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<TR VALIGN="TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 18PT">
<DIV>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 18PT">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: SYMBOL; FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
	&#183;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD>
<DIV ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
	the date on which the Trust is deemed to be a &#8220;large accelerated filer&#8221; under the
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
	Securities Exchange Act of 1934, as amended (the &#8220;Exchange Act&#8221;)
</FONT>
	(the Trust will qualify as a large accelerated filer as of the first day of the first fiscal year after the Trust has (i) more than $700 million in outstanding equity held by non-affiliates and (ii) been public for at least 12 months; the value of its outstanding equity will be measured each year on the last day of its second fiscal quarter).
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
</DIV>
</DIV>
</DIV>
</DIV>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 18PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
	The JOBS Act also provides that an &#8220;emerging growth company&#8221; can utilize the extended transition period provided in Section 7(a)(2)(B) of the Securities Act of 1933, as amended (the &#8220;Securities Act&#8221;), for complying with new or revised accounting standards. However, the Trust is choosing to &#8220;opt out&#8221; of such extended transition period, and, as a result, the Trust will comply with new or revised accounting standards on the relevant dates on which adoption of such standards is required for companies that are not &#8220;emerging growth companies.&#8221; Section 107 of the JOBS Act provides that the Trust&#8217;s decision to opt out of the extended transition period for complying with new or revised accounting standards is irrevocable.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 12PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Trustees
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 36PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
	The trustee of the Trust is The Bank of New York Mellon, a corporation organized under the laws of the State of New York authorized to conduct a banking business. The Delaware trustee of the Trust will be BNY Mellon Trust of Delaware, a Delaware banking corporation.
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
	The Trust&#8217;s website is www.BMOGOLD.com.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</FONT>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="LEFT">

	Principal Office

	The address of the Trust is c/o BNY Mellon Trust of Delaware, 100 White Clay Center, Suite 10, Newark, DE 19711, and the telephone number is (302) 791-3610.
</FONT>

<A NAME="D63160S1_HTM_SUM">
	SUMMARY OF GOLD DEPOSIT RECEIPTS
</A>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 36PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-STYLE: ITALIC; DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
	This discussion highlights information regarding the Gold Deposit Receipts.&#160;&#160;We present certain information more fully in the rest of this prospectus.&#160;&#160;You should read the entire prospectus carefully before you purchase Gold Deposit Receipts.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 12PT; FONT-SIZE: 12PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<TR>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP" WIDTH="44%">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
	Issuer
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP" WIDTH="56%">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
	Vaulted Gold Bullion Trust.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP" WIDTH="44%">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 12PT">

<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP" WIDTH="56%">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP" WIDTH="44%">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
	The Trust
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP" WIDTH="56%">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="LEFT">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
	The Trust was initially formed on December 10, 2013. The Trust is governed by the Amended and Restated Depositary Trust Agreement, dated&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;, 2016 among The Bank of New York Mellon, as trustee, BNY Trust of Delaware, as Delaware trustee, Bank of Montreal, as initial depositor, and BMO Capital Markets Corp., as underwriter.&#160;&#160;The Trust is not a registered investment company under the 1940 Act.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP" WIDTH="44%">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP" WIDTH="56%">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP" WIDTH="44%">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
	Initial Depositor
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP" WIDTH="56%">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
	Bank of Montreal.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP" WIDTH="44%">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP" WIDTH="56%">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP" WIDTH="44%">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
	Trustees
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP" WIDTH="56%">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
	The Bank of New York Mellon, a corporation organized under the laws of the State of New York authorized to conduct a banking business, will be the trustee and receive compensation for its services as set forth in the Depositary Trust Agreement. BNY Mellon Trust of Delaware, a Delaware state chartered banking corporation, will be the Delaware trustee and receive compensation for its services as set forth in the Depositary Trust Agreement.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP" WIDTH="44%">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP" WIDTH="56%">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP" WIDTH="44%">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
	Purpose of Gold Deposit Receipts
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP" WIDTH="56%">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
	The Gold Deposit Receipts are designed to provide investors, acting through Authorized Participants, with:
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="LEFT">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: -18PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 18PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: SYMBOL, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: SYMBOL; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&#183;
</FONT>
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
	A book-entry solution for investors interested in having their Gold Bullion reflected in a brokerage account without the inconvenience that is typical of a traditional, manual investment in Gold Bullion;
</FONT>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: -18PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 18PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="LEFT">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: -18PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 18PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: SYMBOL, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: SYMBOL; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&#183;
</FONT>
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
	A secure and convenient way to purchase Gold Bullion on a spot basis and hold it in an account of Bank of Montreal&#8217;s at the Mint;
</FONT>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: -18PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 18PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="LEFT">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: -18PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 18PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: SYMBOL, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: SYMBOL; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&#183;
</FONT>
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
	A facility whereby investors can withdraw and sell intraday for cash at the spot price for gold (i.e., intraday spot liquidity);
</FONT>
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
</EFX_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV ID="PGBRK" STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT">
<DIV ID="FTR">
<DIV ID="GLFTR" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
	&#160;
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV ID="PN" STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: ALWAYS; WIDTH: 100%">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; WIDTH: 100%">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
	4
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; WIDTH: 100%">
<HR STYLE="COLOR: BLACK" NOSHADE SIZE="2">
</DIV>
</DIV>
<A NAME="eolPage11"></A>
<DIV ID="HDR">
<DIV ID="GLHDR" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 8PT">
<A HREF="#D63160S1_HTM_TOC">
	Table of Contents
</A>
</FONT>
</DIV>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 12PT; FONT-SIZE: 12PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<TR>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" WIDTH="35%">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP" WIDTH="45%">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: -18PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 18PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: SYMBOL; FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: SYMBOL; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&#183;
</FONT>
	&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
	A process whereby investors can request physical delivery for as little as one ounce without the inconvenience or complexity that may be associated with traditional gold-backed exchange-traded products;
</FONT>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: -18PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 18PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="LEFT">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: -18PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 18PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: SYMBOL, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&#183;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
	A structure which, under Canadian federal law, ensures that the Gold Bullion held by the Trust for holders of Gold Deposit Receipts would not be available to meet the claims of creditors of Bank of Montreal in the event of any bankruptcy, insolvency or similar event involving Bank of Montreal; and
</FONT>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: -18PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 18PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="LEFT">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: -18PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 18PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: SYMBOL, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&#183;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
	An alternative to physical gold bullion storage providers or programs that are operated by unregulated entities.&#160;&#160;Bank of Montreal, Canada&#8217;s oldest bank, is regulated by Canadian authorities, and in the United States, by U.S. bank regulators.&#160;&#160;The Gold Deposit Receipts are offered initially by and through the bank&#8217;s wholly-owned subsidiary, BMO Capital Markets Corp., which is a broker-dealer and an investment adviser, subject to SEC oversight and regulation, and is also a FINRA member firm.&#160;&#160;Bank of Montreal is a member of the LBMA and is an approved storage facility in Canada.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: -18PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 18PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="LEFT">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
	The Gold Deposit Receipts seek to eliminate:
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="LEFT">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: -18PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 18PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: SYMBOL, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&#183;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
	Annual fees;
</FONT>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: -18PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 18PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="LEFT">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: -18PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 18PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: SYMBOL, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&#183;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
	Price variance from the underlying spot market for Gold Bullion which may be associated with traditional gold-backed exchange-traded products that trade at a discount or premium to NAV;
</FONT>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: -18PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 18PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="LEFT">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: -18PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 18PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: SYMBOL, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&#183;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
	Derivatives risk (i.e., the use of unallocated gold, gold certificates, exchange-traded products, derivatives, financial instruments, or any product that represents encumbered gold);
</FONT>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: -18PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 18PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="LEFT">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: -18PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 18PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: SYMBOL, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&#183;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
	&#8220;Empty vault risk,&#8221; or Gold Bullion lending risk (i.e., the practice of the gold custodian lending, pledging, hypothecating, re-hypothecating or otherwise encumbering any of the investor&#8217;s underlying Gold Bullion); and
</FONT>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: -18PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 18PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="LEFT">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: -18PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK; MARGIN-LEFT: 18PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE; FONT-FAMILY: SYMBOL, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&#183;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
	Onerous restrictions on physical delivery of Gold Bullion.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-INDENT: 0PT; DISPLAY: BLOCK">
	&#160;
</DIV>

<DIV ID="FTR">
<DIV ID="GLFTR" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
	&#160;
